title: Client Update Major Problem
body: I am new to this game and I downloaded the latest client. The client updates for some time (reaches 60% or 33% or even 8%) and then it drops to 0% and start updating again. I tried repairing and reinstalling but the first one failed and reinstalling didn't do any good. Please help I can't play this game and I am starting to hate it.

replies.body: That's pretty strange if the update itself is restarting. The match might be finishing and starting the next one, but if it's actually resetting it's progress it might be network related. Check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there, but if that doesn't help reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
